name: 2-to-4 Decoder
description: Create a 2-to-4 decoder: convert 2-bit binary input to one-hot 4-bit output
fullDescription: The decoder converts a binary number to a one-hot code where exactly one output is HIGH. A 2-to-4 decoder has 2 inputs and 4 outputs. Input 00 activates output Y0, input 01 activates Y1, and so on. Decoders are essential in memory systems for address decoding, instruction decoding in CPUs, and seven-segment display drivers. Build it using AND gates and inverters - each output needs a unique combination of inputs.
